titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Hampton Court before the Kings Maiestie, on Tuesday the 23. of September, anno 1606. By Iohn Buckeridge, D. of Diuinitie
titleStmt.author: Buckeridge, John, 1562?-1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 4003a on UMI microfilm reel 588, and as STC 4003 on reel 631.
Reproductions of the originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and Cambridge University Library.
Appears at reel 588 (Folger Shakespeare Library copy) and at reel 631 (Cambridge University copy).
Reel 631: title page of Wing C2998 bound at end.
